title: Grad taken on full time after impressing under pioneering DMU Graduate Champions scheme (De Montfort ...
text: ( Source : De Montfort University ) A graphic design graduate has secured a full time job after taking part in one of De Montfort University's pioneering employability schemes. Ilya Nasedkin collected his BA ( Hons ) Graphic Design degree from
